item.title: Gorgeous Mars Curiosity pictures
item.description: Gorgeous Mars Curiosity pictures Well I am little bit late this time but anyhow it is an interesting news. On November first, Sol 2573, Curiosity rover has reached to a bleak mountain in mid of a crater. And from there it has sent some amazing pictures. The objective of going through this path is to understand how and when water was flowing on Mars. Enjoy this gorgeous picture, Sol 2573 Mars Curiosity Rover credit: NASA/JPL-Caltech
